data.description: Advanced grammar and reading: reading selections from various sources in Polish literature, history, and culture.
data.title: FOURTH SEMESTER INTENSIVE POLISH

data.description: Intensive coverage of the structure of the Polish language. Rapid introduction to reading and speaking.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO INTENSIVE POLISH

data.description: Vocabulary reinforced through literature, film and journalism. Readings and discussions related to issues of contemporary Polish society. Continued work on grammar and vocabulary with written exercises and compositions.
data.title: FIFTH SEMESTER INTENSIVE POLISH
